65     def verify_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
66         """Проверяет JWT токен"""
67         try:
68             payload = jwt.decode(token, settings.SECRET_KEY, algorithms=[self.algorithm])
69             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
70                 return None
71             return payload
72         except jwt.ExpiredSignatureError:
73             logger.warning("Token expired")
74             return None
75         except jwt.InvalidTokenError:
76             logger.warning("Invalid token")
77             return None
